TranslatedDescriptions.en: ğŸŒ Snail - Spring Boot 3 + Spring Cloud microservices rapid development scaffold (includes OAuth2 authentication & shadcn UI admin). A lightweight Spring Boot 3 & Spring Cloud microservices scaffold with OAuth2 authentication, JWT, Nacos, Gateway, and shadcn/ui admin frontend. Ideal for rapid development of enterprise backend systems.
